metadata.title: Elan Logic | Web Development Agency
metadata.description: Web development agency specializing in high-converting websites, e-commerce, and SaaS solutions. We build websites that convert visitors into customers.
metadata.homeDescription: Web development agency specializing in high-converting landing pages, e-commerce stores, and SaaS applications. We build websites that turn visitors into customers.
metadata.aboutDescription: Learn about Elan Logic - a web development agency focused on building high-converting websites that drive business results. 50+ projects delivered with 95% client satisfaction.
metadata.servicesDescription: Professional web development services: Landing Pages for conversions, E-commerce stores for online sales, and SaaS applications for scalable businesses. Custom-built solutions.
metadata.blogDescription: Insights on landing pages, e-commerce, and SaaS development. Learn how to build better web products with guides from the Elan Logic team.
metadata.contactDescription: Get in touch with Elan Logic. Contact us via WhatsApp, email, or social media to discuss your web development project.

hero.title: Websites that convert
hero.description: We design and develop high-performing websites that drive results. From landing pages to e-commerce and SaaS applications, we build digital experiences that grow your business.

servicesPreview.title: What We Build
servicesPreview.description: Tailored solutions for every stage of your business

services.pageDescription: From simple landing pages to complex SaaS applications, we have the expertise to bring your vision to life.
services.notSureDescription: Let's have a conversation about your project. We'll help you identify the best solution for your business goals.

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.description: High-converting landing pages designed to turn visitors into customers. Perfect for product launches, marketing campaigns, and lead generation.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Full-featured online stores that make selling easy. From product catalogs to secure payments, we build everything you need to succeed.

saas.title: SaaS
saas.description: Scalable software-as-a-service applications built for growth. From authentication to billing, we handle the technical complexity.

quartierFlow.title: Quartier Flow
quartierFlow.description: A modern e-commerce platform for boutique retail, featuring a seamless shopping experience and elegant product presentation.

laluDecor.title: Lalu Decor
laluDecor.description: An interior design showcase website with stunning visuals and an intuitive gallery experience for home decor inspiration.

savoirLink.title: Savoir Link
savoirLink.description: A professional networking platform connecting experts with those seeking specialized guidance.

process.title: Our Process
process.description: A proven approach to delivering exceptional results

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We start by understanding your business, goals, and target audience to create a strategic foundation for your project.

design.title: Design
design.description: Our designers create stunning, user-focused interfaces that align with your brand and optimize for conversions.

development.title: Development
development.description: We build your website using modern technologies, ensuring fast performance, security, and scalability.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: After thorough testing, we deploy your site and provide ongoing support to ensure continued success.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Success stories from businesses we've helped grow

testimonial1.content: Elan Logic transformed our online presence. Our new e-commerce site has doubled our conversion rate and customers love the seamless shopping experience.
testimonial1.name: Maria Santos

testimonial2.content: The team at Elan Logic understood our vision from day one. They built a platform that perfectly balances functionality with beautiful design.
testimonial2.name: Lucas Fernandes

testimonial3.content: Working with Elan Logic was a breeze. They delivered a stunning portfolio site that showcases our work exactly how we envisioned it.
testimonial3.name: Ana Costa

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Online Presence?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your business goals with a website that converts.

about.heroDescription: Elan Logic is a web development agency dedicated to helping businesses succeed online. We combine technical expertise with creative design to build websites that not only look great but also drive measurable results.
about.founderAlt: Nelson Tamashiro - Founder of Elan Logic
about.storyP1: Founded with a simple mission: to help businesses thrive in the digital world. We noticed that many companies struggled to translate their vision into an effective online presence, often settling for generic templates or overpriced solutions.
about.storyP2: We set out to change that by offering custom web development that's both accessible and results-oriented. Today, we work with businesses of all sizes, from startups launching their first landing page to established companies scaling their e-commerce operations.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide everything we do

resultsDriven.title: Results-Driven
resultsDriven.description: We measure success by the results we deliver for our clients. Every line of code is written with conversion and performance in mind.

clientFocused.title: Client-Focused
clientFocused.description: We treat every project as a partnership. Your success is our success, and we work closely with you to understand and achieve your goals.

innovationFirst.title: Innovation First
innovationFirst.description: We stay at the forefront of web technology, using modern tools and frameworks to build fast, secure, and scalable solutions.

contact.heroDescription: Ready to start your project? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out and let's discuss how we can help grow your business.
contact.whatsappDescription: For the fastest response, reach out to us on WhatsApp. We're typically available during business hours and aim to respond within a few hours.

blog.heroDescription: Practical guides on landing pages, e-commerce, and SaaS development. Learn what it takes to build web products that convert.

landingPages.heading: Ready to build your landing page?
landingPages.description: We specialize in creating high-converting landing pages that turn visitors into customers. Let's discuss your project.
landingPages.whatsappMessage: Hi! I just read your article about landing pages and I'd like to discuss my project.

ecommerce.heading: Ready to launch your online store?
ecommerce.description: We build e-commerce solutions that scale with your business. From Shopify to custom platforms, we've got you covered.
ecommerce.whatsappMessage: Hi! I just read your article about e-commerce and I'd like to discuss my project.

saas.heading: Ready to build your SaaS product?
saas.description: We help founders turn their ideas into scalable software products. Let's talk about your MVP or next feature.
saas.whatsappMessage: Hi! I just read your article about SaaS development and I'd like to discuss my project.

whatsapp.defaultMessage: Hi! I'm interested in learning more about your web development services.

common.siteDescription: Web development agency specializing in high-converting websites, e-commerce, and SaaS solutions.
